Verses: 1 isravelin Meyppare, Yoseppai Aattumandhaiyaippol Nadaththugiravare, Sevikodum; Kerubeengal Maththiyil Vaasampannugiravare, Piragaasiyum.
2 eppiraayeem Benyameen Manaase Enbavargalukku Munbaaga, Neer Umadhu Vallamaiyai Ezhuppi, Engalai Ratchikka Vandharulum.
3 dhevane, Engalaith Thiruppikkonduvaarum, Umadhu Mugaththaip Piragaasikkappannum, Appozhudhu Ratchikkappaduvom.
4 senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Umadhu Janaththin Vinnappaththukku Virodhamaai Neer Edhuvaraikkum Kobankolveer.
5 kanneeraagiya Appaththai Avargalukku Pojanamaagavum, Migudhiyaana Kanneeraiye Avargalukkup Baanamaagavum Koduththeer.
6 engal Ayalaarukku Engalai Vazhakkaaga Vaikkireer; Engal Saththurukkal Engalaip Pariyaasampannugiraargal.
7 senaigalin Dhevane, Engalaith Thiruppikkonduvaarum, Umadhu Mugaththaip Piragaasikkappannum, Appozhudhu Iratchikkappaduvom.
8 neer Egipdhilirundhu Oru Thiraatchakkodiyaik Konduvandhu, Jaadhigalaith Thuraththivittu, Adhai Naattineer.
9 adharku Idaththai Aayaththappaduththineer; Adhu Veroondri, Dhesamengum Padarndhadhu.
10 adhin Nizhalaal Malaigalum Adhin Kilaigalaal Dhivviyamaana Kedhurukkalum Moodappattadhu.
11 adhu Than Kodigalaich Samuththiramattaagavum, Than Kilaigalai Nadhimattaagavum Padaravittadhu.
12 ippozhudho Vazhinadakkira Yaavarum Adhaip Parikkumpadiyaaga, Adhin Adaippugalai En Thagarththuppotteer?
13 kaattuppandri Adhai Uzhudhupodugiradhu, Veliyin Mirugangal Adhai Meyndhupodugiradhu.
14 senaigalin Dhevane, Thirumbivaarum, Vaanaththilirundhu Kannokkippaarththu, Indhath Thiraatsachchediyai Visaariththarulum;
15 ummudaiya Valadhukaram Naattina Kodiyaiyum, Umakku Neer Thidappaduththina Kilaiyaiyum Kadaatchiththarulum.
16 adhu Akkiniyaal Sudappattum Vettundum Poyitru; Ummudaiya Mugaththin Bayamuruththalaal Azhindhupogiraargal.
17 umadhu Karam Umadhu Valadhupaarisaththup Purushanmeedhilum, Umakku Neer Thidappaduththina Manushakumaaranmeedhilum Iruppadhaaga.
18 appozhudhu Ummaivittup Pinvaangamaattom; Engalai Uyirppiyum, Appozhudhu Umadhu Naamaththaith Thozhudhukolluvom.
19 senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Engalaith Thiruppikkonduvaarum; Umadhu Mugaththaip Piragaasikkappannum, Appozhudhu Ratchikkappaduvom.
